definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Lauren asked a bone-tired volunteer. The man shook his head.
sentences.chinese: 劳伦斯问一个累得筋疲力尽的自愿者，那人摇了摇头。

sentences.english: Tots also turned into avid volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 小孩们也成为热心的自愿者。

sentences.english: They divided the volunteers into five groups, called quintiles.
sentences.chinese: 他们将自愿者共分为5个大组，并进行对比试验。

sentences.english: You have come here voluntarily to this blue green jewel and you have incarnated into the physical tenacities of flesh.
sentences.chinese: 们原本是自愿者来到这蓝绿星球，转生物理的。

sentences.english: So one way to make the transition a little easier is to volunteer.
sentences.chinese: 因此，转变稍微容易一些的一个途径是做自愿者。

sentences.english: Volunteer at your local animal shelter to take the dogs for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 在当地动物救助站当自愿者，带着狗出去散步。

sentences.english: Non-profit organizations are reporting record numbers of new volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 非营利机构正报道新自愿者的人数。

sentences.english: The blue is refugee camps these volunteers had spotted from the air.
sentences.chinese: 蓝色的是那些自愿者从空中发现的难民营。

sentences.english: In my university years, I volunteered to teach in rural schools.
sentences.chinese: 我上大学时，以自愿者的身份前往农村地区教书。

definition: program bringing education to underdeveloped areas/to work in such a program
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
red waistcoat/floor trader in stock market/stockbroker
